en-AU.name: Space Facts
en-AU.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter. And to make your parents learn a little more

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

en-GB.name: Space Facts
en-GB.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy even your grandmothers and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts or black hole facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa Can you please help me play a game about space facts
